bibl.title: Oxyrhynchite Documents among the Robinson Papyri.
bibl.note: Paper presented to the XIX Int. Congr. of Pap., Cairo 1989. Eight documents, A.D. I-III: Division of Property; Orders for Grants of Seed (2 doc.); Declaration of Weavers; Trooper's Receipt for Barley; Lease of Farm Land; Lease of a Vineyard; Payment Order for Purchase at Auction.
Willis William H., Oxyrhynchite Documents among the Robinson Papyri.
